import React,{ useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './index.css'; import axios from "axios"; import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode'; export default function Index() { const [review, setReview]=useState(""); useEffect(() => { // Decode JWT token to get the username const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); // Assuming token is stored in localStorage if (token) { const decoded = jwt_decode(token); setUserName(decoded.username); } }, []); function sendData(e){ e.preventDefault(); const newReview ={ userName: 'hiran', review } axios.post("http://localhost:8070/review/addReview",newReview).then(()=>{ alert("review submited"); setReview(""); }).catch((err)=>{ alert(err) }) } const [reviews, setReviews] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get("http://localhost:8070/review/display") .then((response) => { setReviews(response.data); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }, []); return (

EAT OUT Restaurant has been a local favorite for more than a decade, situated near the coastal lines of the western province of Sri Lanka. Savannah is known for its authentic Sri Lankan food, exotic Indian and Chinese cuisine and a blend of western and continental dishes.
